text: My Lottery Dream Home is an American reality television series on HGTV. It is hosted by David Bromstad. It premiered on March 7, 2015. It is produced by 7Beyond, a joint venture between Beyond International and Seven Network. ==Premise== The show follows David Bromstad as he helps lottery winners find a luxurious property after striking it rich. ==Production== Season 1 premiered on March 7, 2015. Season 2 premiered on January 6, 2017. Season 3 premiered on June 2, 2017. Season 4 premiered on February 9, 2018. Season 5 premiered on September 21, 2018. Season 6 premiered on January 1, 2019. Season 7 premiered on April 5, 2019. Season 8 premiered on December 13, 2019. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2015–16)=== ===Season 2 (2017)=== ===Season 3 (2017–18)=== ===Season 4 (2018)=== ===Season 5 (2018)=== ===Season 6 (2019)=== ===Season 7 (2019)=== ===Season 8 (2019–20)=== ==References== Category:2010s American reality television series Category:HGTV original programming Category:2015 American television series debuts
title: My Lottery Dream Home
